website_summaries.verdict: Heavy-weight disposable diapers that can be reused if not soiled.
pros: While these are disposable wraps, the product includes a hook-and-loop closure which makes it reusable if the wrap has not been soiled
It is easier to put on your dog than a full diaper
Stay in place to catch dribbles
Good for incontinence or dogs who want to mark
cons: They only catch urine (do not cover the rear end)

customer_reviews.title: Best disposable male wrap I have found so far
customer_reviews.text: I am sad that this brand is getting harder to find and purchase. It really is great - the stick side really sticks and is easily re-sticks if you let dog out and bring him back in and put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K. Wire

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Although my 6 lb toy poodle houdini’s himself out of them when he’s groomed, they have been a carpet saver for me. They are super absorbent and work great!
customer_reviews.author: ceadie1

customer_reviews.title: good product for dogs in home.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand for my little dog for awhile glad to find same product! Thank you! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Galarza

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Yorkie
customer_reviews.text: Our 15 yr old Yorkie leaks and these keep our furniture and bed clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size received was smaller than item pictured
customer_reviews.text: Out has been a great product for my dog but they have changed the sizing. I ordered this multi-pack because the product pictured is the 14-19" waist size I have used with success in the past. The product received is 13-18" waist. I opened them and tried them on my dog and they are just a bit too tight so they won't be useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Worry free
customer_reviews.text: They work really well - my dog was incontinent and even though the wraps were full, no leaking occurred. Easy to put on male dogs also.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Jensen

customer_reviews.title: were a little small for my dog whose size is ...
customer_reviews.text: were a little small for my dog whose size is a little big for size medium but too small for next size.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Stenlund

customer_reviews.title: Doggie diapers
customer_reviews.text: The XS were a little big on my 7lb dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: they are great..
customer_reviews.text: they are great... they have helped me so much with my dogs peeing in my house.. great product.. they should come in large size also for the large breeds...
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product works great for my doggie. Thank you for this product
customer_reviews.author: Anthony padua

product_meta.title: OUT! 12 Count Disposable Male Wraps, XS/Small – Fits 13 inch to 18 inch - 4 Packs
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:4 PackOUT! Disposable Male Wraps (12 ct) are specifically designed to fit male dogs with a 13 in - 18 in waist. Our disposable male wraps provide a soft, leak-proof fit with adjustable, fur-friendly fasteners and a super absorbent core to give your pet a secure and comfortable fit. Simple and easy to use: position the wrap so the extra absorbent pad covers your dog's genitals, and pull the adjustable closures around his back for a secure fit. Male wraps are perfect for male dogs with incontinence, male marking issues, and for travel. 4 Packs of 12 Diapers (48 total diapers)
feature_bullets: NEW SIZE TO WRAP IT UP - OUT! Disposable XS/Small Male Wraps are designed to fit xs/small-sized male dogs with a 13-18 inch waist. These will help to keep your little buddy comfy and dry, while helping you maintain peace of mind.
Designed with a soft, leak-proof fit with adjustable, fur-friendly fasteners and a super absorbent core to give your pet a secure and comfortable fit
Perfect for male dogs with incontinence, male marking issues, and for travel
